summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the King County Local Care Management program (KCLCM); authorizing a grant agreement with the Washington State Department of Social and Health Services (DSHS) for funding to operate the program; authorizing the execution of contracts in connection with this grant funding; increasing an appropriation in the 2007 budget of the Human Services Department (HSD) contingent upon the receipt of this grant funding; creating two new positions in HSD contingent upon receipt of this grant funding; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
